title: AWFUL !!!!
review: Unfortunately, I've seen it and it's a real terrible movie. It's a bad joke... It's really tedious. I don't understand how people can like it !

title: TERRIFIC
review: You MUST see this beautiful movie : you'll love it !!! I've read the book and I liked it too much but the movie is better. (Usually it's better to read his books instead of seeing a movie). They didn't spoil the story as they usually do. The story is well-played, the cast is perfect.
